input.sentences: the beautiful flower we found on the beach .
the beautiful clouds in the sky from the beach .
the canal we took to go fishing .
the amazing rock with trees growing .
a dead fish on the shore .
output.sentences: I was walking in the tall grass and found this beautiful flower.
I tucked one behind my ear and went on to visit the beach and look at the mesmerizing sky with its beautiful clouds.
The water at the fishing canal was very deep and the greenery around it was lush.
From where I sat, I could see a small island rock with growing green trees on it.
Despite all this beauty around me, there was a dead fish on shore, hinting at pollution somewhere.
